metadata.title: notationGetPublicIdNull
metadata.creator: NIST
metadata.description:
The "getPublicId()" method of a Notation node contains the public identifier associated with the notation, if one was not specified a null value should be returned.
Retrieve the notation named "notation2" and access its public identifier. Since a public identifier was not specified for this notation, the "getPublicId()" method should return null.
